    • Method Detail

      • setName

        public void setName(java.lang.String nameIn)
        Stores the "name" of the list. This is the "salt" used to build the uniqueName used by the ListTag and ColumnTag.
        Parameters:
        nameIn - list name

      • getUniqueName

        public java.lang.String getUniqueName()
        Build the list's unique name Algorithm for the unique name is: Take the CRC value of the following string: request url + ";" + name
        Returns:
        unique name

      • setHeader

        public void setHeader(java.lang.String headerIn)
        Header is a string to go on the top of a CSV exported file, can be used to provide extra info to a user.
        Parameters:
        headerIn - optional text to be printed as first line of exported CSV file

      • getHeader

        public java.lang.String getHeader()
        Returns:
        optional header text for CSV file

      • setDataset

        public void setDataset(java.lang.String nameIn)
                throws JspException
        Sets the name of the dataset to use Tries to locate the list in the following order: page context, request attribute, session attribute
        Parameters:
        nameIn - name of dataset
        Throws:
        JspException - indicates something went wrong

      • setupPageData

        public void setupPageData()
                   throws JspException
        Throws:
        JspException - exception raised if datasetname is not defined
